citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:15 pm - 1:45
pm on 12/25/2014.
Please contact the inspector if your hours of availability have changed.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.

pm on 12/25/2014.
Please contact the inspector if your hours of availability have changed.
